name: tango-desert.vim
summary: Dark Color scheme based on tango palette and desert
description:
This dark color scheme is based on tango color palette ( http://tango.freedesktop.org/Tango_Icon_Theme_Guidelines#Color_Palette ) & desert color scheme by Hans Fugal.

screenshots : http://rand-tech.blogspot.com/2009/06/tango-desert-colorscheme-vim.html
install_details:
install details
=== Linux  ===
mkdir ~/.vim/colors
cp tango-desert.vim  ~/.vim/colors

=== Windows ===
copy the file tango-desert.vim to vim7x/colors/

=== Usage ===
To use the color scheme,
:colorscheme tango-desert

versions.release_notes: Fix in contrast of autocomplete menu; Aluminum replaced with Plum palette colors
